titleStmt.title: The saints nosegay, or, A posie of 741 spirituall flowers both fragrant and fruitfull, pleasant and profitable / collected and composed by Samuel Clark.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, Samuel, 1599-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.D. for Henry Overton and are to be sold at his shop,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
